Package org.ambraproject.rhino.view.article

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ArticleView
    A serializable view object representing an article or some subset of an article's data.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArticleAuthorView
    JSON output view class for authors of an article.
    ArticleCriteria
    Criteria from an API client describing a subset of articles.
    ArticleInputView
    A view of an update to an article's state as submitted by a REST client.
    ArticleInputView.SyndicationUpdate  
    ArticleJsonConstants  
    ArticleJsonConstants.MemberNames
    Names of JSON members that are meaningful for input.
    ArticleOutputView
    A view of an article for printing to JSON.
    ArticlePingbackView
    A view of an article that contains a digest of its associated pingbacks (and some other data that's friendly to a particular client-side use case).
    ArticleStateView
    A view of an article containing only its stateful attributes that can be modified by the client directly.
    ArticleViewList
    A list of article views that are keyed by DOI.
    ArticleVisibility
    An object describing an article's visibility: whether it is in a published state, and the set of journals in which it has been published.
    DoiList
    A list of bare DOIs that can be serialized to JSON with structure identical to ArticleViewList.
    NoCitationsArticleAdapter
    Simple adapter for Article that hides the citedArticles field.
    RecentArticleView
